content.data: image2.gif
Creating a Square Raised Panel Door (cope & stick)

To create a Square Raised Panel Door with cope & stick construction you must first have an "Inside Edge Profile" that matches your Door cutters. See "Checking the Door Stile Size", " Inside Edge Profile " and "Checking the Door Rail Size".

Click on the "Create A New Door Style" button. 
 
 
 Name the Door. 
 
 
 Select a Category to store the Door on, use the "Raised Panel" category. 
 
 
 Click on the "Construction" tab. 
 
 
 Click in the middle of the Door and select "Raised Panel" as the panel type for this Door. 
 
 
 Select a sample "Inside Edge Profile" to use with this Door. 
 
 
 Select a sample "Raised Panel Detail" to use with this Door. 
 
 
 Click the "Add Top and Bottom Rail, Left and Right Stile" tool. 
 
 
 Check the Door part sizes. 
 
 
 Click on the "Profiles" tab and select the appropriate Profiles to use with this Door. 
 
 
 Click on the "Materials" tab and select the appropriate Material Schedules to use with this Door.
